TopicTitle: Position Satellite into a keosynchronous network??? This is different...

Articles.Content:
OK, this is different. I'm about 125 days into a great 1.0.5 career, playing with no mods other than chatterer, and I just got something I've never seen before. A contract offer to "Position a satellite into a keosynchronous network"
Yes, network.
I'm not sure quite what to make of this one... is it a contextual thing? Will I get more offers later to add to "the network"???

Needless to say I accepted it and will put a new satellite up ASAP to see if anything more happens...
Ahhhhhhhhhh... yup, that's what I got. COOL!
